Statute.Title: Rouge National Urban Park Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Parc urbain national de la Rouge, Loi sur le)

Minister.Text: Minister responsible for Parks Canada Agency (s. 2)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2015, c. 10 (assent: 23.04.2015), provisions of the Act, ss. 1 to 54, and its schedule in force 15.05.2015 see SI/2015-37
CIF, 2017, c. 10, ss. 1 to 3 in force on assent 19.06.2017
CIF, SOR/2024-96 in force 27.05.2024 see s. 5
